abstract: A configuration object that requests the creation of a console device to communicate with the guest system.
overview:
## Overview

A [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioConsoleDeviceSerialPortConfiguration] object enables serial communication between the guest operating system and host computer through the Virtio interface. After you create this configuration object, configure its inherited [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZSerialPortConfiguration/attachment] property with an object that defines the type of serial communication you want to enable. Use a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZFileHandleSerialPortAttachment] object to enable two-way communication between the guest and host, and use a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZFileSerialPortAttachment] object to enable one-way communication from the guest to the file you designate.

# VZVirtioConsoleDeviceSerialPortConfiguration

**Class**

A configuration object that requests the creation of a console device to communicate with the guest system.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZVirtioConsoleDeviceSerialPortConfiguration
```

## Overview

A [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioConsoleDeviceSerialPortConfiguration] object enables serial communication between the guest operating system and host computer through the Virtio interface. After you create this configuration object, configure its inherited [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZSerialPortConfiguration/attachment] property with an object that defines the type of serial communication you want to enable. Use a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZFileHandleSerialPortAttachment] object to enable two-way communication between the guest and host, and use a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZFileSerialPortAttachment] object to enable one-way communication from the guest to the file you designate.

## Creating the Configuration Object

- **init()**: Creates a serial port configuration object.

## Configurations

- **VZSerialPortConfiguration**: The common configuration traits for serial port requests.

## Inherits From

- VZSerialPortConfiguration

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
